pageTitle: What were the dates of the period you spent outside the UK?

dateYouLeft.required: Enter the date you left the UK.
dateYouLeft.format: Enter a real date that you left the UK.
dateYouLeft.change: Change the date you left the UK

dateYouReturned.legend: Date you returned to the UK
dateYouReturned.required: Enter the date you returned to the UK.
dateYouReturned.format: Enter a real date that you returned to the UK.
dateYouReturned.change: Change the date you returned to the UK
